parameters: \n<\N[13]>No civilian may enter the trading post on the order of the \C[13]King\C[0]!
\n<\N[13]>It's the anniversary of \C[13]Great King Leon's\C[0] victory.
\n<\N[13]>The \C[13]King\C[0] has ordered all trading posts to be closed until further notice.
\n<\N[1]>But, I need to pickup my order.
\n<\N[13]>I'm sorry ma'am but orders are orders.
\n<\N[1]>But I can't go back with nothing.
\n<\N[13]>There are weak monsters roaming the land, you look strong enough to take out a boar.
\n<\N[1]>Eeeee, you really think sooo, I've always wanted to be an adventurer.

\n<\N[13]>You are in a lot of trouble.
\n<\N[2]>The other soldiers said we weren't being arrested.
\n<\N[13]>However the \C[17]idol\C[0] protecting your village has caused many gears to move into motion.

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 98 Do You Remember Her-

parameters: \n<\N[1]>Were killing two birds with one stone here.
\n<\N[1]>We just get the \C[17]amulet\C[0] and the other \C[17]idol\C[0] at the same time.
\n<\N[2]>We should probably head back to \C[25]Brassica\C[0] to resupply.
\n<\N[4]>And we can check up on my mum.
\n<\N[2]>It wasn't suppose to be like this.
\n<\N[2]>I just wanted to become a great magician in the \C[13]King's\C[0] army.
\n<\N[2]>Be the same ones that protected us \C[13]Bluu\C[0]?

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 98 Do You Remember Her-

parameters: \n<\N[3]>I never liked soldiers to begin with.
\n<\N[11]>His judgement is righteous and true, but sometimes his rage controls his actions.
\n<\N[11]>My lord will be informed at the appropriate time.
